content: the underarms where the sleeves will be placed on hold while underarm stitches and front henley stitches are cast on for joining the body in the round the body is worked in the round and ended with a 1x1 rib the sleeves are placed back on needles and underarm stitches are picked up and knitted the sleeve is worked in the round in the round and ended with a 1x1 rib the neckband is picked up and worked in a 1x1 rib with button holes for the henley at the same time a striped pattern is being worked the pattern indicates when to begin your stripes the stripes in the sample are worked with 6 row/rounds in contrasting color and 8 row/rounds in main color the sleeve pattern is explained under the sleeve section start here back yoke first the top part of the back yoke is worked back and forth stitches are cast on for the back and then short row are worked to shape the shoulders work as follows with main needles and mc co 88 88 92 92 100 100 100 104 104 sts locking stitch markers are placed to indicate where the neck sts are work as follows p24 24 26 26 30 30 30 32 32 pm2 in co chain p40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 pm1 in co chain p to end next r is rs german short row r1 k to m2 k3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 4 turn r2 sl-gsr p to m1 p3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 4 turn r3 sl-gsr k to gsr k-gsr k3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 4 turn r4 sl-gsr p to gsr p-gsr p3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 4 turn repeat r 3 4 until 14 row have been worked in total for all sizes after the last turn sl-gsr k to gsr k-gsr k to end break yarn and place back stitches on hold right shoulder in this section with the rs facing the right shoulder is picked up from the back co edge with new mc yarn and main needles pick up and k24 24 26 26 30 30 30 32 32 sts along the co edge from the right side from shoulder edge to m2 purl 1 r next r is rs work as follows r1 k to end r2 p to end 3 knitting of course milo repeat r1-2 for a total of 16 20 20 24 24 28 28 28 28 row worked next r is rs break the yarn and place right shoulder sts on hold while the left shoulder is worked left shoulder in this section with the rs facing the left shoulder is picked up from the back co edge with new mc yarn and main needles pick up and k24 24 26 26 30 30 30 32 32 sts along the co edge from the right side from m1 to shoulder edge
